claim.text: Stranger Things is set in Bloomington, Indiana.
claim.exact_quote: Stranger Things is set in Bloomington, Indiana.

evidence.evidence_text: Stranger Things is an American science fiction horror drama television series created by the Duffer Brothers. Set in the 1980s, primarily in the fictional town of Hawkins, Indiana, the series centers on a number of mysteries and supernatural events occurring around the town and their impact on an ensemble of child and adult characters.
evidence.exact_quote: Stranger Things is an American science fiction horror drama television series created by the Duffer Brothers. Set in the 1980s, primarily in the fictional town of Hawkins, Indiana, the series centers on a number of mysteries and supernatural events occurring around the town and their impact on an ensemble of child and adult characters.

conclusion.key_limitations: The claim is based on a fictional town, not Bloomington, Indiana.

claim.text: Beautiful reached number two on the Billboard Hot 100 in 2003.
claim.exact_quote: Beautiful reached number two on the Billboard Hot 100 in 2003.

evidence.evidence_text: The song peaked at number two on the Billboard Hot 100 in the United States, where it was certified Gold for 500,000 units shipped.
